entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
